# Generated by "yarp cmake" & Juan G. Victores 2014

add_library(GameStatesLib DeadState.hpp
                          DeadState.cpp
                          GameState.hpp
                          GameState.cpp
                          InitState.hpp
                          InitState.cpp)

target_include_directories(GameStatesLib PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})

target_link_libraries(GameStatesLib PUBLIC UtilsLib
                                           StateMachineLib
                                           InputLib
                                           NetworkLib
                                           ImageLib
                                           MentalMapLib
                                           RobotLib
                                           MusicLib
                                           UserInterfaceLib)
